name: Explorex
headline: Ecosystem Platform for Restaurants in India
description:
The Indian restaurant industry has already adopted technology to adapt to the growing demands and match the expectations of today's customers but the absence of a full-stack cloud-based software is extremely frustrating to business owners today. The existing systems lack modularity, lack the ability to integrate with services, and hence aren't plug and play. Also, Restaurants are extremely frustrated with all the 5-6 independent systems that don't talk to each other. 

We are solving these problems by building a full-stack solution for the 30 million+ restaurants in India, by solving order management, operations management, online delivery, payment processing, reports & analytics, and guest identification and re-engagement all using one system - Explorex.

founders.name: Mainak Sarkar, Founder
founders.description: Hardcore product guy with core focus on UX and Practicality. Leading Explorex - A company that aims to revolutionise the dining out industry through tech. We at Explorex are building a full-stack solution for the 30 million+ restaurants in India, by solving order management, operations management, online delivery, payment processing, reports & analytics, and guest identification and re-engagement all using one system!

OUR SOLUTIONS
Built with inputs from Industry Experts
for people who care about their Restaura
![](https://explorex.co/solutions_foh.png)
Front of the House
Enables you to effectively manage walk-in guests, rush hour queues & reservations from multiple sources.
HOW IT WORKS  ![](https://explorex.co/arrow-right.svg)
Front of the House
. 
Realtime queue & running table details for easier management
. 
Consolidated data collection, directly connected to your ecosystem
. 
Customer intimations on reserved tables through SMS/WhatsApp
![](https://explorex.co/arrow-left.svg) back 
![](https://explorex.co/solutions_digital_menu.png)
Digital Menu
Present your customers with a well-crafted dynamic digital menu that can be accessed by scanning the QR right from the customer's Mobile.
HOW IT WORKS  ![](https://explorex.co/arrow-right.svg)
Digital Menu
. 
Manage, and update items, and prices on the fly
. 
Schedule and automate multiple menus for special occasions
. 
Reduce recurring costs of managing physical menus
. 
Increase the visibility of top-performing items
![](https://explorex.co/arrow-left.svg) back 
![](https://explorex.co/solutions_automated_ordering.png)
Automated Ordering
Give diners full control to choose & order at their convenience through the web app.
HOW IT WORKS  ![](https://explorex.co/arrow-right.svg)
Automated Ordering
. 
Web-based ordering Mechanism using the mobile handset (No app download required)
. 
Seamless Ordering Experience
. 
Increase Average No’s of Orders Per table thereby increasing revenue. 
. 
View E-Bill and pay for a smoother Checkout Process.
![](https://explorex.co/arrow-left.svg) back 
![](https://explorex.co/solutions_integrated_POS.png)
Integrated POS/mPOS
Cloud-based integrated dashboard which also acts as a Point of sales to manage and keep track of sales
HOW IT WORKS  ![](https://explorex.co/arrow-right.svg)
Integrated POS/mPOS
. 
Manage incoming orders from web-based ordering
. 
Single-click KOT print management/solution
. 
Comes with all the functionalities of POS (Table management, Punch order, Manage NC, Manage Discount, Table Settlements, etc)
. 
User rights-based access to perform actions in the dashboard
. 
Can also be operated using mobile handsets
![](https://explorex.co/arrow-left.svg) back 
![](https://explorex.co/solutions_integrated_payments.png)
Integrated Payments
Simplify the payment processes and settlements for your diners, staff, and cashier through the auto settlement of tables with our Integrated Payment Solutions.
HOW IT WORKS  ![](https://explorex.co/arrow-right.svg)
Integrated Payments
. 
Web APP payment: Diners can directly pay from Webapp
. 
Integrated UPI: Dynamic UPI QR code is printed at the bottom of a physical bill which diners can scan & pay using any UPI app
. 
Integrated EDC: Simply enter the table number in the EDC provided or scan Table QR to fetch the amount or bill details, upon a successful payment table gets auto-settled
![](https://explorex.co/arrow-left.svg) back 
![](https://explorex.co/solutions_inventory_management.png)
Inventory Management
A complete backend inventory management solution to manage your vendors, purchase orders, GRN, payments, and recipes
HOW IT WORKS  ![](https://explorex.co/arrow-right.svg)
Inventory Management
. 
Purchase orders are directly sent to the vendor via Email and SMS when raised
. 
Input GRN and eliminate the hassle of managing paper bills by uploading invoices
. 
Set PAR, and Expiry, and get notified automatically
. 
Input Recipe to know food cost, and know stock in hand based on the recipe
![](https://explorex.co/arrow-left.svg) back 
![](https://explorex.co/solutions_analytics_reports.png)

.

.

CLIENT RESULTS 
Let’s talk numbers 
40%
Faster Table Turn Around 
Decrease the table turnaround time by up to 40% with a fully automated and integrated restaurant management solution.
30%
Growth in Avg. Ticket Size 
Seamless ordering experience increases the average nos of orders per table, thereby increasing average ticket size by upto 30%.
25%
Increased Guest Experience 
With Faster ordering processing and call for assistance increase guest experience.
2x
Increase in Staff Productivity 
Fully automated and integrated solution empowers staff with more time than before to engage in upselling, and other things than only order taking.
HIGHLIGHTS
Features that you will absolutely love

With Integrated Payment Solutions
![](https://explorex.co/_next/static/media/update_menu_icon.5ac7aee7.svg)
Update Menu Pricing in a Click 
Increase or decrease prices on the fly by amount/percentage

Call for steward assistance 
In the same user web used by customers
![](https://explorex.co/_next/static/media/connect_with_customers_icon.cf6d8035.svg)
Bridge connects with customers 
Directly by using privacy protected call feature
![](https://explorex.co/_next/static/media/multilocation_management_icon.6c59c382.svg)
Multilocation Management 
All from one single dashboard
![](https://explorex.co/_next/static/media/single_click_kot_print_icon.3c434787.svg)
Single-click KOT print Solution 
Along with Clarity on every KOT print status

OUR SOLUTIONS
Built with inputs from Industry Experts
for people who care about their Restaura
![](https://explorex.co/solutions_foh.png)
Front of the House
Enables you to effectively manage walk-in guests, rush hour queues & reservations from multiple sources.
HOW IT WORKS  ![](https://explorex.co/arrow-right.svg)
Front of the House
. 
Realtime queue & running table details for easier management
. 
Consolidated data collection, directly connected to your ecosystem
. 
Customer intimations on reserved tables through SMS/WhatsApp
![](https://explorex.co/arrow-left.svg) back 
![](https://explorex.co/solutions_digital_menu.png)
Digital Menu
Present your customers with a well-crafted dynamic digital menu that can be accessed by scanning the QR right from the customer's Mobile.
HOW IT WORKS  ![](https://explorex.co/arrow-right.svg)
Digital Menu
. 
Manage, and update items, and prices on the fly
. 
Schedule and automate multiple menus for special occasions
. 
Reduce recurring costs of managing physical menus
. 
Increase the visibility of top-performing items
![](https://explorex.co/arrow-left.svg) back 
![](https://explorex.co/solutions_automated_ordering.png)
Automated Ordering
Give diners full control to choose & order at their convenience through the web app.
HOW IT WORKS  ![](https://explorex.co/arrow-right.svg)
Automated Ordering
. 
Web-based ordering Mechanism using the mobile handset (No app download required)
. 
Seamless Ordering Experience
. 
Increase Average No’s of Orders Per table thereby increasing revenue. 
. 
View E-Bill and pay for a smoother Checkout Process.
![](https://explorex.co/arrow-left.svg) back 
![](https://explorex.co/solutions_integrated_POS.png)
Integrated POS/mPOS
Cloud-based integrated dashboard which also acts as a Point of sales to manage and keep track of sales
HOW IT WORKS  ![](https://explorex.co/arrow-right.svg)
Integrated POS/mPOS
. 
Manage incoming orders from web-based ordering
. 
Single-click KOT print management/solution
. 
Comes with all the functionalities of POS (Table management, Punch order, Manage NC, Manage Discount, Table Settlements, etc)
. 
User rights-based access to perform actions in the dashboard
. 
Can also be operated using mobile handsets
![](https://explorex.co/arrow-left.svg) back 
![](https://explorex.co/solutions_integrated_payments.png)
Integrated Payments
Simplify the payment processes and settlements for your diners, staff, and cashier through the auto settlement of tables with our Integrated Payment Solutions.
HOW IT WORKS  ![](https://explorex.co/arrow-right.svg)
Integrated Payments
. 
Web APP payment: Diners can directly pay from Webapp
. 
Integrated UPI: Dynamic UPI QR code is printed at the bottom of a physical bill which diners can scan & pay using any UPI app
. 
Integrated EDC: Simply enter the table number in the EDC provided or scan Table QR to fetch the amount or bill details, upon a successful payment table gets auto-settled
![](https://explorex.co/arrow-left.svg) back 
![](https://explorex.co/solutions_inventory_management.png)
Inventory Management
A complete backend inventory management solution to manage your vendors, purchase orders, GRN, payments, and recipes
HOW IT WORKS  ![](https://explorex.co/arrow-right.svg)
Inventory Management
. 
Purchase orders are directly sent to the vendor via Email and SMS when raised
. 
Input GRN and eliminate the hassle of managing paper bills by uploading invoices
. 
Set PAR, and Expiry, and get notified automatically
. 
Input Recipe to know food cost, and know stock in hand based on the recipe
![](https://explorex.co/arrow-left.svg) back 
![](https://explorex.co/solutions_analytics_reports.png)
Detailed Analytics & Report
Enable data-backed decision making which improves your bottom line efficiency, overall restaurant productivity, and growth
HOW IT WORKS  ![](https://explorex.co/arrow-right.svg)
Detailed Analytics & Report
. 
Enable data-backed decision making which improves your bottom line efficiency, overall restaurant productivity, and growth
. 
With Explorex for Owners, access real-time performance of your restaurant from your mobile devices
. 
Get access to the franchise-level data from one single dashboard
![](https://explorex.co/arrow-left.svg) back

Customer Re-engagement Tool
Run targeted campaigns to engage and retain customers through Explorex's smarter profiling for optimal results and reduce marketing costs
HOW IT WORKS  ![](https://explorex.co/arrow-right.svg)
Customer Re-engagement Tool
. 
Bucket customers based on order history, number of visits, bill size, etc to run campaigns

Increased conversion with targeted campaigns
. 
Scratch card & loyalty points for customer delight and retention

Manage online orders directly from Bridge to print KOT & Bill

generated_description:
Explorex is on a mission to revolutionize the restaurant ecosystem in India. Founded in 2020, this Bengaluru-based startup is tackling a critical pain point in the restaurant industry: the lack of an integrated, cloud-based management system. Traditionally, restaurant owners have faced the frustration of juggling multiple, disjointed software systems that simply don’t communicate with each other. Explorex aims to change that.

The company delivers a comprehensive, full-stack solution tailored for the over 30 million restaurants in India. Their platform covers everything from order management and operations to online delivery, payment processing, and guest engagement. By consolidating all these features into a singular system, Explorex eliminates the inefficiencies of using several unconnected services.

Explorex gained traction quickly, emerging from Y Combinator’s S20 batch, which provided valuable guidance and resources for scaling its services. The team, composed of 18 employees, has received endorsements from restaurant owners like Fox in the Field and Food Culture, who praise the platform for boosting operational efficiency and revenue. 

So, what sets Explorex apart? Here are the core features:

1. **Automated Ordering**: Customers can place orders directly through a web app—no cumbersome app downloads required.
2. **Integrated POS**: A cloud-based point of sale that facilitates seamless order tracking and management.
3. **Real-Time Analytics**: Owners have access to live data on restaurant performance, enabling data-driven decisions.
4. **Customer Re-engagement Tools**: Smart profiling helps restaurants connect with their customers, enhancing loyalty and retention through targeted campaigns.
5. **Third-Party Delivery Integration**: Manage multiple delivery services like Swiggy and Zomato from a single dashboard.

With these solutions, restaurant owners can expect a faster table turnaround (up to 40% improvement), increased average ticket sizes (up to 30%), and significant boosts in staff productivity—effectively enabling them to focus on providing excellent customer service rather than administrative tasks.

As the restaurant landscape continues to evolve, Explorex stands at the forefront, empowering business owners with the tools they need to thrive in a competitive market. If you're interested in giving your restaurant operations a much-needed upgrade, check out Explorex for a free demo at [Explorex.co](https://explorex.co).
